text: Music is like a dream. One that I cannot hear.
Deaf people can do anything hearing people can, except hear.
Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
The handicap of deafness is not in the ear; it is in the mind.
Own your identity. Love who you are in the world. Love your deafness.
I actually think the deafness makes you see clearer. If you can't hear, you somehow see.
I live my life like everyone else; everyone has their own obstacles. Mine is deafness.
Deafness and sign language are extremely close to my heart.
Nature is not mute, it is a man who is deaf.
Am I complaining about my deafness? No, I am not.
Sign language is the noblest gift God has given to deaf people.
I'm not a deaf musician. I'm a musician who happens to be deaf.
As long as we have deaf people on earth, we will have signs.
At some point we have to stop and say, There's Marlee, not, There's the deaf actress.
I do love to interpret songs in American Sign Language.
